scripts.test: npm run test:be && npm run test:fe
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:be && npm run test:coverage:fe
scripts.test:watch: npm run test:watch:be & npm run test:watch:fe
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:be && npm run build:fe
scripts.dev: npm run dev:be & npm run dev:fe
